game.title: Dragon Slayer
game.objective: Defeat the Ancient Dragon in the Forgotten Mountain
game.description: Local villagers have been terrorized by an Ancient Dragon residing in the Forgotten Mountain. Your task is to brave the treacherous terrain, reach the dragon's lair, and slay the beast.
game.reward: 5000 gold coins and the Dragon's Soul gemstone

task.objective: Gather information about the dragon from the village elder
task.description: Visit the elder of the village and gather information about the lair of the ancient dragon

task.objective: Find the hidden path to the mountain
task.description: According to the elders, a hidden path behind the waterfall leads to the dragon's lair. Find this path.
Engage in battle with the dragon and defeat it to bring peace to the village.
task.location: Dragon's lair at the summit of Forgotten Mountain
